explains: v. 使现代化；变得现代化

sentences.en: Romania badly needs aid to modernize its outmoded industries.
sentences.cn: 罗马尼亚迫切需要援助以对其过时的产业进行现代化。

sentences.en: Unfortunately we lack the resources to modernize.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是我们缺乏现代化所需的财力。

sentences.en: They resisted our attempts to modernize the distribution of books.
sentences.cn: 他们抵制我们将书籍发行现代化的努力。
